pageProduct.name: Swisse Milk Thistle 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Ultiboost High Strength Milk Thistle is a premium quality high strength formula to support liver health and detoxification.

Swisse Ultiboost High Strength Milk Thistle is a premium quality formula to support liver health and detoxification.

Liver Regeneration: Factors such as diet and environmental toxins including pollution can place burden on the liver. Formulated with milk thistle, traditionally used in Western herbal medicine as a liver tonic to nourish and protect the liver, support healthy liver regeneration and promote bile flow from the liver.

Detoxification: The liver is responsible for eliminating toxins by playing a central role in the process of metabolism, helping with their removal from the body. Milk thistle supports liver health, maintains healthy liver function, and supports natural liver cleansing and detoxification processes. 

Gallbladder Health: Milk thistle has been traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to support gallbladder health.

Antioxidant: Milk thistle helps reduce free radical damage to cells in the body and supports natural liver cleansing processes, to support general health and wellbeing.

Lifestyle Claim: Vegetarian

Size: 60 Tablets

Warnings

Do not use if pregnant or likely to become pregnant. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.

Ingredients

MILK THISTLE (Silybum marianum extract 500 mg) equiv. dry fruit.

Allergen Free From: Artificial Flavours| Egg| Gluten| Lactose| Soy| Yeast

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
One tablet daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place.

Storage Temperature: Store below 25°C
